description.value:
Charm

Aura 20; while the havoc goristro is bloodied, a nonbloodied enemy that ends its turn within the aura takes 10 damage if it didn't hit the havoc goristro that turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+18 vs AC; 2d10 + 3 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

The goristro rips a chunk from the ground and hurls it; ranged 10/20; +16 vs Reflex; 2d6 + 7 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

At-Will

Standard

The havoc goristro makes two basic attacks.

At-Will

Standard

The havoc goristro makes 3 slam attacks. It can't target the same creature with more than two of these attacks.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The havoc goristro uses blood fury, then moves its speed.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When damaged by an attack, at-will

The havoc goristro makes a charge attack against the creature that damaged it.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Close blast 3

+16 vs AC; 2d8+3 damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close burst 10

Trigger: When first bloodied

+16 vs Fortitude; 2d6 + 6 damage, and the target is knocked prone. Effect: The havoc goristro makes a charge attack against one creature knocked prone by this power.

Cha 10 (+6)
Languages Abyssal
Alignment Chaotic evil
Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 19 | Insight 19
